Interface PushedAssetsAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PushedAssetsAPIImpl

    public interface PushedAssetsAPI

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAllPushedAssets()
      deletes all the push assets entries
      void deletePushedAssets(java.lang.String assetId)
      deletes the push assets entries for the given Asset Id.
      void deletePushedAssets(java.lang.String bundleId, java.lang.String environmentId)
      deletes the push assets entries for the given Bundle Id and Environment Id.
      void deletePushedAssetsByEnvironment(java.lang.String environmentId)
      deletes the push assets entries for the given environment Id.
      java.util.List<PushedAsset> getPushedAssets(java.lang.String assetId)
      returns all the push assets for a given assetId
      void savePushedAsset(PushedAsset asset)
      persists the given PushedAsset object to the underlying data layer.

      • savePushedAsset

        void savePushedAsset(PushedAsset asset)
                     throws DotDataException
        persists the given PushedAsset object to the underlying data layer.
        Parameters:
        asset - the pushed asset to be persisted
        Throws:
        DotDataException - thrown when an error in the underlying data layer occurs

        Parameters:

        environmentId - the id of the environment

      • deletePushedAssets

        void deletePushedAssets(java.lang.String assetId)
                        throws DotDataException
        deletes the push assets entries for the given Asset Id.
        Parameters:
        assetId - the id of the asset whose pushed assets records will be deleted
        Throws:
        DotDataException - thrown when an error in the underlying data layer occurs
